about_the_game:
Get the Deluxe Edition DLC to support development and unlock these benefits!

  • +1,500 Uranium
    Instantly get +1,500 Uranium added to your account (worth $15 USD).

  • +15,000 ACID
    Instantly get +15,000 ACID added to your account.

  • 3x ACID & XP From Daily Challenges & Level Ups
    Permanently earn 3x ACID and XP from regular daily challenges (+2000 additional ACID per day). Also get 150 instead of 50 ACID from level ups.

  • Bonus Flasks From Level Ups
    Earn 2x more flasks. This includes special flasks like Legendary flasks.

  • More Trophies on Modifiers
    Modifiers earn trophies 2x faster, and their trophy limit is raised to 50.

  • Attempt 50+ Crazy Challenges
    Unlock the challenge grid to earn over 2500 uranium worth of rewards.

  • Supporter Medallion On Name
    Display the GSA medallion next to your name. Can be toggled on or off.

  • Get Exclusive DLC Cosmetics
    Get up to 35 exclusive cosmetics, like the cape and colored bullet trails.

  • Unlimited Survival Runs
    Play unlimited survival runs with no daily limit.
detailed_description:
Get the Deluxe Edition DLC to support development and unlock these benefits!

  • +1,500 Uranium
    Instantly get +1,500 Uranium added to your account (worth $15 USD).

  • +15,000 ACID
    Instantly get +15,000 ACID added to your account.

  • 3x ACID & XP From Daily Challenges & Level Ups
    Permanently earn 3x ACID and XP from regular daily challenges (+2000 additional ACID per day). Also get 150 instead of 50 ACID from level ups.

  • Bonus Flasks From Level Ups
    Earn 2x more flasks. This includes special flasks like Legendary flasks.

  • More Trophies on Modifiers
    Modifiers earn trophies 2x faster, and their trophy limit is raised to 50.

  • Attempt 50+ Crazy Challenges
    Unlock the challenge grid to earn over 2500 uranium worth of rewards.

  • Supporter Medallion On Name
    Display the GSA medallion next to your name. Can be toggled on or off.

  • Get Exclusive DLC Cosmetics
    Get up to 35 exclusive cosmetics, like the cape and colored bullet trails.

  • Unlimited Survival Runs
    Play unlimited survival runs with no daily limit.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB. OpenGL 2.0+ recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run at 60+ fps. Requires the internet to save your progress, stats and highscores.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB. OpenGL 2.0+ recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run at 60+ fps. Requires the internet to save your progress, stats and highscores.

name: Gene Shift Auto: Deluxe Edition

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB. OpenGL 2.0+ recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run at 60+ fps. Requires the internet to save your progress, stats and highscores.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB. OpenGL 2.0+ recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run at 60+ fps. Requires the internet to save your progress, stats and highscores.

short_description: Gene Shift Auto is a GTA-style battle royale with roguelike build crafting. Loot, shoot, and adapt your build to create godlike synergies before the final fight.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, German
*languages with full audio support
